data.name: Assembly_Intro_Return
data.value: Is there anything e-else I can help with?

data.name: Assembly_Goodbye
data.value: So long! Good luck w-with your adventures!

data.name: Assembly_Members_Shuffled
data.value: Just shuffling party order around?[pause=0] No problem!

data.name: Assembly_Leader_Changed
data.value: {0}{1} will become the leader of the party{2}

data.name: Assembly_Members_Added
data.value: {0}{1} will be added to the party{2}

data.name: Assembly_Members_Removed
data.value: {0}{1} will be removed from the party{2}

data.name: Assembly_Make_Changes
data.value: Alright! With a ring of this bell I'll change your party accordingly!

data.name: Assembly_Info_001
data.value: I'm s-sure you've wanted to have other Pokémon besides the two of you on adventures,[pause=10] right?

data.name: Assembly_Info_002
data.value: With my assembly,[pause=10] you can add or remove anyone you have recruited with Apricorns to your team for adventures!

data.name: Assembly_Info_003
data.value: Any team members you choose for an adventure will wait at the café for you!

data.name: Assembly_Info_004
data.value: Of course,[pause=10] you two will always be on the active team.[pause=0] You wouldn't want to miss out on any adventures,[pause=10] r-right?

data.name: Assembly_Info_005
data.value: Just know that sometimes only the two of you will be allowed on an adventure!

data.name: Assembly_Info_006
data.value: By the way,[pause=10] Pokémon names colored like [color=#00FF00]this[color] instead of [color=#00FFFF]this[color] are species you've already recruited!

data.name: Assembly_Info_007
data.value: Oh,[pause=10] one more thing![pause=0] You can also ring the signpost by the café to call me to use the assembly!

data.name: Assembly_Info_008
data.value: My e-ears are really sensitive,[pause=10] so I'll hear the bell and come running!
